uiEntry.title: title_frame
uiEntry.tooltip: Use this panel to change settings for the campaign and battlefield areas of the game.

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: Change the frequency of advice and how you receive it by using the two drop-down menus and the text and audio options below.

uiEntry.title: row_example
uiEntry.script:
local parent = UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent(3))
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("SelectOption", Address) end

uiEntry.title: row_example
uiEntry.script:
local parent = UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent(3))
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("SelectOption", Address) end

uiEntry.title: audio
uiEntry.script:
dofile "data/ui/templates/template.fe_button_standard.lua"
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function OnClickUp() UIComponent(this:Parent()):LuaCall("Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, this:CurrentState(), Address) end

uiEntry.script:

function OnClickUp() UIComponent(this:Parent()):LuaCall("Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, this:CurrentState(), Address) end

uiEntry.script:

uiEntry.title: row_example

local parent = UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent(3))

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: These settings are specifically for the campaign area of the game.

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: If this is checked you will be able to see any visible CPU player's moves during the end turn phase.||This can help to keep a track on some of the CPU's locations and movements, but the end turn phase will also take longer.

uiEntry.title: label_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: When this is ticked the game will try to find battles for you to join while you are playing the campaign game.

state.title: NewState
state.stateText: Search continuously for other players Drop-in battles

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: Enable this to send and receive voice chat from other players.

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: Move the slider to adjust the difficulty level on the battlefield.

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: If this is checked, players will have a more restricted UI in battles.||There will be no radar, reduced information on enemy banners and tooltips, and the camera will be restricted to units line of sight.

state.title: NewState
state.tooltip: A battle with a set time limit will end when the time is up.||If this happens, the defending army will win the battle.||With no time limit set, the battle will simply play out until one army is victorious.

uiEntry.script:
dofile "data/ui/templates/template.fe_button_standard.lua"
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function OnClickUp() UIComponent(this:Parent()):LuaCall("Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, this:CurrentState(), Address) end
